text: 17.45 In order to satisfy Part 1(b), applicants will need to submit a full detailed marketing report outlining the asking price or rent for the facility and the terms on which it was offered. The report should include details of any interest in the property, viewings, and why such interest was not taken forward. The report should outline comparative rent prices for other arts and culture uses in the area to justify the asking price. This information should also be provided for a subsequent 12-month period outlining attempts to let the property for any alternative community use as described under Part 1(c).
